name: Modmail
description: An easy to install Modmail bot for Discord - DM to contact mods!

GITHUB_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Your personal access token for GitHub, adding this gives you the ability to use the 'update' command, which will sync your fork with the main repo.

MONGO_URI.description: Mongo DB connection URI for self-hosting your data.

LOG_URL.description: The url of the log viewer app for viewing self-hosted logs.
